heading: Testing on World Bosses â€“ April 8, 2025
content: Adam Fletcher just announced a backend change coming live later today to test out activating trigger effects that doesn't work on World Bosses currently as well as performance improvements. Don't forget Season 8 is coming soon! Indeed, the 2.2.0 PTR ended a few weeks go and while we are patiently waiting, you can check out the 2.2.0 PTR Patch Notes to be prepared for Season 8! We hope you enjoyed the Season of Witchcraft with the aid of our Season 7 updates. Our focus is now on the 2.2.0 PTR and Season 8, grabbing as much knowledge we can for Season 8 to provide you the best If you haven't already, head over to our to stay up to date with our content development. Written by:
